alert.note: Alert for Plumas (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 05 at 1:24PM PDT until May 06 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM PDT FRIDAY MAY 12... * WHAT...Very high flows along Little Last Chance Creek due to an upstream dam release at Frenchman Dam and increased snowmelt. * WHERE...A portion of northeast California, including the following county, Plumas. * WHEN...Until 330 PM PDT Friday May 12. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas and nearing Highway 70. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 120 PM PDT, Flooding is possible along Little Last Chance Creek due to an upstream dam release and increased snowmelt. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... low lying areas around Little Last Chance Creek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
